data.name: ActionIsUnsupported
data.value: Action is unsupported for this type of notifications

data.name: AllNewsRequest
data.value: This option will sequentially poll all notifications. It may take some time. Continue?

data.name: BackgroundRequestInProgress
data.value: Please wait for the remaining notifications to respond...

data.name: BeginningFieldMessage
data.value: Sign of beginning of notification text

data.name: CenterButtonLabel
data.value: Function of the button under the log

data.name: ComparatorLabel
data.value: Check the first number in text and make urgent alert when value is

data.name: ComparatorTypes
data.value: > (greater than) ≥ (greater than or equal to) < (less than) ≤ (less than or equal to) = (equal to) ≠ (not equal to) ∈ (contains)

data.name: CurlyTemplate
data.value:
Remember to replace items enclosed in curly braces with values you want.
For example: {CITY} to Reykjavik, {CURRENCY} to ZWL

data.name: EndingFieldMessage
data.value: Sign of ending of notification text

data.name: FindDisclaimer
data.value: For using this function specify some keyword from needed website’s area in the “Beginning” field

data.name: FontSizeLabel
data.value: Font size of the main log: {0:D}

data.name: KeepScreenOnLabel
data.value: Keep the screen on while app is opened

data.name: LaunchMessage
data.value: Notification service is in standby mode. Click on this message to go to the main log

data.name: LoadingWarning
data.value: WARNING: this option will overwrite all existing settings. Continue?

data.name: NewItemsMessage
data.value: New records: {0:D}. Click this message to watch them

data.name: NewsAtTheEndLabel
data.value: Add new records to the end of main log

data.name: NoTemplateInClipboard
data.value: No compatible notification templates found in the clipboard. Copy template string to clipboard and try again

data.name: NotEnoughDataMessage
data.value: One of required fields is empty, or link to website is specified incorrectly

data.name: NotMatchingNames
data.value: Notification with the same name already added

data.name: ReadModeLabel
data.value: Night theme for the main log

data.name: SaveQuietSound
data.value: Create and save a quiet audio file (for non-urgent notifications)

data.name: SearchFailure
data.value: Link to webpage is incorrect or keyword is not found on this page

data.name: Tip01
data.value:
Welcome to uNot, the web resources supervisor service!
• On this page you can configure existing notifications.
• Swipe this screen to the right to set up parameters of the service and add new web resources to watch

data.name: Tip02
data.value:
• Detailed instructions for setting up the service are available on YouTube. Swipe this screen to the left and select the user guide for watching it.
• The main notifications log is available on the first page of the application. It will be opened on every further start of the app

data.name: Tip03_1
data.value: Warning! Some devices are requiring manual unlocking of internet access (f.e., in case of internet traffic saving mode) for the app. Check it if you will not get notifications

data.name: Tip03_2
data.value:
Also, your device requires manual permission for sounds, lights and vibration for notifications. Select them in the system settings if necessary (when the background service is enabled – otherwise settings will be unavailable).
The application creates two notification channels: • for urgent and mixed (which require sound or vibration indication); • for non-urgent (which can be left without indication).
The channeling is determined by the “Urgent notifications only” and “Threshold” settings

data.name: Tip04_1
data.value: This button allows you to apply changes performed below to the currently selected notification

data.name: Tip04_10
data.value: This option allows you to open the source of the selected notification in browser

data.name: Tip04_11
data.value: This button allows you to select notification for configuring

data.name: Tip04_13
data.value: If this switch is enabled, the background service will remain active when the app is closed or minimized. This allows you to quickly call the app when necessary (via a pinned notification) and see the quantity of unread records in the main log

data.name: Tip04_15
data.value: In some cases, the needed part of webpage is not the first on it, which is limited by the specified markers. This field allows you to specify which occurrence of the target area (from the top of the page) should be displayed

data.name: Tip04_18
data.value: All operations with texts of notifications are available through the clicking on them in the main log

data.name: Tip04_2
data.value: This button allows you to share settings of notifications

data.name: Tip04_20
data.value:
This function allows you to set a numerical threshold. It will be compared with the first number in every obtained text using the specified comparison method. If the new text matches the condition, app will display a special warning.
It is also possible to display the notification only if this condition is met

data.name: Tip04_21
data.value: The update rate is now configurable for each notification separately. Check it before running the background request

data.name: Tip04_22
data.value: These switches allow you to specify which methods of indication the app should use when there is unread items. You can also disable indication for non-urgent notifications

data.name: Tip04_23
data.value: This switch allows you to turn off the indication for non-urgent notifications. If it is inactive, all news are processed as mixed (have an indication)

data.name: Tip04_25
data.value: This switch keeps the screen active while you’re reading notifications texts (i. e. while the app is opened)

data.name: Tip04_3
data.value: This button allows you to add new notification with settings presented above

data.name: Tip04_4
data.value: This button allows you to remove selected notification

data.name: Tip04_7
data.value:
This option allows you to share the text of selected notification.
Please note that app adds links to information sources to notifications you share (in order to respect the rights of authors). It is recommended not to remove them when distributing texts using this function

data.name: UrgentChannel
data.value: Urgent and mixed (when indication is required)

data.name: WizardFailure
data.value:
Unable to determine suitable markup.
Refine the site URL or try a different keyword

data.name: WizardStep1
data.value:
Welcome to the notifications wizard!
This function will help you to create a notification (“watchdog”) for web resource.
First, enter the link (URL) of the website you want to watch

data.name: WizardStep2
data.value:
Now enter a keyword.
This word (or phrase) should be present right now in a part of the website you want to watch, and you expect it to change over time. The ideal would be a phrase that is present now only in this area or is first encountered on the website in it. The case of letters doesn’t matter

data.name: WizardStep3
data.value: For the specified settings, the text below is received. If it meets your expectations, click “Next” to add the notification. Otherwise, click “Retry” and we’ll try again

data.name: WizardStep4
data.value: For the specified settings, the text below is received. If it meets your expectations, click “Next” to add the notification. Otherwise, cancel the action and try a different keyword

data.name: WizardStep5
data.value: It’s ready! Now specify the name of notification to be displayed in the main log
